title: what does ornn eat?
body: i know he eats meat and stuff but how does he eat like does he cook the meat or just eat it raw?

replies.body: "Everything is better when it is molten. Lead, iron, chocolate cake."
"Humans have done some things right: beer, dark beer."
"The best meal is a herd of cattle, with dark beer, and cherries... Mmm."
The only correct answer to this, is Children. Children like Annie go down real easy, especially after tenderising them with his forge hammer!
I thought he ate rocks lmao
